description: Follow this easy recipe to make a fragrant massaman curry with tender beef. Slow-cooking this Thai curry brings out the incredible depth of flavour.
name: Slow-Cooker Massaman Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup Valcom Thai Style Massaman Curry Paste

recipeInstructions.text: Divide massaman curry and rice among bowls and serve topped with chilli, onion and peanuts.
